DeviceInfo
DeviceInfo

Contains information on an attached device

Types
ConnectionType
connectionType_serial

0 - Serial connection (or usb-to-serial)

connectionType_tcp

1 - TCP/IP connection

Functions
DeviceInfo
DeviceInfo()

Creates a DeviceInfo object

DeviceInfo
DeviceInfo(
std::string description,
std::string serial,
uint32 baudRate,
ConnectionType type
)

Creates a DeviceInfo object with the given parameters

Parameters
description
std::string

The description of the device

serial
std::string

The serial address that is issued for this device

baudRate
uint32

The suspected baud rate of the device

type
ConnectionType

The ConnectionType of the device

Variables
m_description
std::string m_description

The description of the device.

m_serial
std::string m_serial

The serial address that is issued for this device.

m_baudRate
uint32 m_baudRate

The suspected baud rate of the device.

m_connectionType
ConnectionType m_connectionType

The ConnectionType of the device.

Functions
description
std::string description() const

Gets the description for the device

Returns

The description of the device

serial
std::string serial() const

Gets the serial address for the device

Returns

The serial number of the device

baudRate
uint32 baudRate() const

Gets the suspected baud rate at which to open a Connection with the device.

Returns

The suspected baud rate to open the connection with the device.  This is not gauranteed to be correct as it is basing this value on the driver info available, which doesn't always have uniquely identifiable information.

connectionType
ConnectionType connectionType() const

Gets the ConnectionType of the device.

Returns

The ConnectionType of the device.
